#Text=Ontario Votes 2007 : Interview with Libertarian candidate Larry Stevens , Kitchener-Conestoga
#Text=Thursday , October 4 , 2007
#Text=is running for the Libertarian Party in the Ontario provincial election , in the Kitchener-Conestoga riding .
#Text=Wikinews ' Nick Moreau interviewed him regarding his values , his experience , and his campaign .
#Text=Stay tuned for further interviews ; every candidate from every party is eligible , and will be contacted .

#Text=Expect interviews from Liberals , Progressive Conservatives , New Democratic Party members , Ontario Greens , as well as members from the Family Coalition , Freedom , Communist , Libertarian , and Confederation of Regions parties , as well as independents .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=Why did you choose to run in this constituency ?

#Text=Over the years , I 've watched our politicians : do harm with programs they told us would do good , hurt the people they 've told us they were going to help , and break one promise after another .
#Text=I 've also seen them give our tax money and lucrative government contracts to their friends .
#Text=In the three years since my retirement , I 've done a lot of investigation and come to the conclusion that government regulations and programs are ineffective and many are actually harmful .

#Text=I 've chosen to become involved in the political process and to run in this election because I think the people of Ontario need to be told about the abuses our government is inflicting on them .
#Text=When I retired , I moved from Toronto to South Kitchener .
#Text=I really like this area and am seriously considering making my home here .
#Text=What better place to take a stand and run for office .
#Text=What prior political experience do you have ?
#Text=What skills and insight can you bring to office , from other non-political positions you may have held ?
#Text=I 've lived in Ontario all my life , have voted in virtually every election since I was eligible to vote , and I was a member of the board of a condominium corporation for several years .
#Text=I 've worked as both and employee and a contractor for government , and for private industry in both the service sector and manufacturing .
#Text=I 've also owned and run my own small businesses in the service sector and manufacturing .
#Text=As a result of this experience , I know how things are done in the public and the private sector .
#Text=I 've developed skill in analysing problems and finding viable solutions through my education as a Mathematical Physicist and my career as a software developer .

#Text=I 've learned how to explain difficult concepts and unconventional or complex ideas through my education as a Secondary School teacher and during my career as a mentor to junior developers and a trainer of programming languages .
#Text=These are skills I feel I need to get the Libertarian message across .
